title: Tracking issue for RFC 1937: `?` in `main`

labels.name: E-mentor
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue has a mentor. Use RustcContributor::new on Zulip for discussion.

labels.name: B-RFC-approved
labels.description: Approved by a merged RFC but not yet implemented.

labels.name: T-lang
labels.description: Relevant to the language team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-help-wanted
labels.description: Call for participation: Help is requested to fix this issue.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
This is a tracking issue for the RFC "`?` in `main`" (rust-lang/rfcs#1937).

**Steps:**

- [x] Implement the RFC ([mentoring instructions can be found here](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/43301#issuecomment-330476381)).
    - [x] `?` in `main` (#46479)
    - [x] `?` in doctest
    - [x] `?` in `#[test]`
- [ ] Adjust documentation ([see instructions on forge][doc-guide])
- [x] Stabilization PR ([see instructions on forge][stabilization-guide])

[stabilization-guide]: https://forge.rust-lang.org/stabilization-guide.html
[doc-guide]: https://forge.rust-lang.org/stabilization-guide.html#updating-documentation

**Stabilizations:**

- [x] Stabilize `main` with non-() return types (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/48453) Merged in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/49162
- [x] Stabilize unit tests with non-() return types (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/48854)

**Related issues:**

- [x] Error message for unit tests is not great (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/50291)

**Unresolved questions:**

- [x] The name of the trait being introduced
- [x] The precise initial implementations
    - this will be stabilized by #48453 
- [x] exit codes ([discussion](https://internals.rust-lang.org/t/mini-pre-rfc-redesigning-process-exitstatus/5426)) Moved to a separate tracking issue, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/48711
    - ~~this will be stabilized by #48453~~ no longer true after https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/48497
